result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt: Transcript of Sentencing from February 9, 2017.
Defendant Monica M Bruckner in court with attorney Peter J. Salza.  Edward M Bremberger appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Case was previously dismissed and read-in to 15CM486 & 16CM1895.
Calendar call on February 9, 2017 at 09:45 am.
Calendar call on January 11, 2017 at 09:00 am.

Defendant Monica M Bruckner in court with Attorney Peter J. Salza.  Shawn N Woller appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  This case is dismissed and read-in for Defendant's plea to Case #15CM486 and Case #16CM1895.
Hearing on November 2, 2016 at 08:30 am.

Attorney Peter J. Salza appears by telephone.   Defendant Monica M Bruckner did not appear.  Timothy Suha appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Attorney Salza requests an adjournment.  State does not object.  Court adjourns.   Bail remains as fixed.  Hearing scheduled for November 2, 2016 at 08:30 am.
Letter dated 8/24/16 requesting adjournment filed by defendant/defense counsel.
Hearing on August 25, 2016 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Monica M Bruckner in court with attorney Peter J. Salza.  Timothy Suha appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Attorney Salza requests a jury status and jury trial on Case #15CM486.  Court adjourns this case along with Case #15CM486 on jury status date.  Bail remains as fixed.  Hearing scheduled for August 25, 2016 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Monica M Bruckner in court with Attorney Peter J. Salza.  Stephen Joseph Centinario appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Attorney Salza is now attorney of record.  Attorney Salza requests an adjourned date to discuss cases with Defendant.    Bail remains as fixed.  Hearing scheduled for June 3, 2016 at 10:00 am.
Hearing on April 28, 2016 at 10:30 am.

Defendant Monica M Bruckner in court with Attorney Roberto R. Ledesma.  Timothy Suha appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Attorney Ledesma states that Defendant is unhappy with his representation and communications have broke down between them and moves to withdraw as counsel.  Defendant states she wishes to obtain new counsel.  Court grants request to withdraw as counsel.  Court sets new court date for further proceedings so Defendant can obtain new counsel.   Bail remains as fixed.  Hearing scheduled for April 28, 2016 at 10:30 am.

Defendant Monica M Bruckner in court with Attorney Roberto R. Ledesma.  Stephen Joseph Centinario appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court adjourns along with Case #15CM486.   Bail remains as fixed.  Hearing scheduled for March 29, 2016 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Monica M Bruckner in court with Attorney Roberto R. Ledesma.   District Attorney's Office Law Intern Natalie Schiferl appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  This case is adjourned along with Case #15CM486 to status date.   Bail remains as fixed.  Hearing scheduled for March 24, 2016 at 10:30 am.
Plea/sentencing hearing at 01-28-2016 03:00 pm

Defendant Monica M Bruckner in court with Attorney Roberto R. Ledesma.   District Attorney's Office Law Intern Katrina Seipel appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Attorney Ledesma requests a 30 day adjournment.  Court adjourns.   Bail remains as fixed.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for January 28, 2016 at 03:00 pm.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for January 28, 2016 at 03:00 pm.

to appear filed by Attorney Roberto Ledesma

Attorney Ledesma requests an adjourned date.    Court ordered a capias stayed until next court date.  Hearing scheduled for September 17, 2015 at 09:30 am.

Defendant Monica M Bruckner in court with Attorney Jacques Mann for Attorney Roberto R. Ledesma.   District Attorney's Office Law Intern Katrina Seipel appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  State does not have an offer at this time.  Court adjourns.   Bail remains as fixed.  Hearing scheduled for August 31, 2015 at 09:00 am.
Hearing on July 27, 2015 at 09:00 am.

Defendant Monica M Bruckner in court with attorney Thomas K. Voss and Atty Jaques Mann.  Atty Mann appears for Atty Ledesma. Lucas Paul Bennewitz appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Atty Voss requests to withdraw due to Defendant retaining private counsel. Atty Ledesma has been retained. Court orders Atty Voss to be withdrawn.  Court adjourns.   Bail remains as fixed.
Hearing on June 10, 2015 at 09:30 am.

Absolute sobriety, defendant is not to possess or consume any alcohol.  Defendant is not to have any violent contact with Daniel K.   Defendant to have no contact with witness listed in the Criminal Complaint.

Defendant Monica M Bruckner in court, in custody, with attorney M. Elizabeth Weathers.    District Attorney's Office Law Intern appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   NOT GUILTY PLEA ENTERED.  Hearing scheduled for June 10, 2015 at 09:30 am.
